DataElement.preferredName: CoPaQ Income Loss Reason Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe the reason that patient had loss of income other than the reasons previously listed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cost for Patients Questionnaire Income Loss Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.:A gain or recurrent benefit during a period of time, usually measured in money that derives from capital or labor._A gradual decline in amount or activity._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.
